Tool

NameSky View Factor
ID3
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2008
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculation of visible sky, sky view factor (SVF) and related parameters. References: Boehner, J., Antonic, O. (2009): 'Land-surface parameters specific to topo-climatology'. in: Hengl, T., Reuter, H. (Eds.): 'Geomorphometry - Concepts, Software, Applications'. Developments in Soil Science, Volume 33, p.195-226, Elsevier Hantzschel, J., Goldberg, V., Bernhofer, C. (2005): 'GIS-based regionalisation of radiation, temperature and coupling measures in complex terrain for low mountain ranges'. Meteorological Applications, V.12:01, p.33-42, doi:10.1017/S1350482705001489 Oke, T.R. (2000): 'Boundary Layer Climates'. Taylor & Francis, New York. 435pp.
